title: About Us

sections.text: My name is Oleh Makhnichev, and I am an independent procurement and logistics consultant based in Germany. With 20 years of international experience in procurement, logistics, and contract negotiations, I help German and European companies source products effectively from Ukraine and other Eastern European countries.

I work closely with a reliable and professional team in Ukraine, operating mainly from two key logistics hubs — Dnipro and Lviv. Our local presence enables us to efficiently search for products, conduct inspections, manage local procurement, and organize customized repackaging before export.
We guarantee full transparency and accountability. As a registered freelance consultant operating under German tax law, I ensure compliance with all current legal requirements.

Our mission is to make your cooperation safe, productive, and culturally comfortable. We are fluent in German, English, Ukrainian, and Russian, bridging Western and Eastern European business cultures to provide professional, responsive, and culturally aware service.

My experience also includes cooperation with leading Ukrainian retail chains such as ATB, Varus, Epicentr, Prostor, Avrora, and EVA. We are open to two-way cooperation: both supplying Ukrainian goods to Europe and promoting European brands in the Ukrainian market. I also help European companies establish direct contacts with Ukrainian retailers and distributors.
Whether you need a reliable supply source, in-depth market research, logistics solutions, or support in communicating with Ukrainian partners — I am ready to support you at every step.
